test-case.sql: REVOKE select, update on t_order from default_user
REVOKE default_role from default_user
REVOKE ADVISOR, ALTER DATABASE from user_dev
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES, GRANT OPTION FROM 'user_dev'@'localhost'
REVOKE select, insert ON * FROM 'user_dev'@'localhost'
REVOKE select, insert ON t_order FROM 'user_dev'@'localhost'
REVOKE select, insert ON primary_ds.t_order FROM 'user_dev'@'localhost'
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* FROM user_dev
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES (order_id) ON TABLE t_order FROM role2
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES (order_id) ON TABLE t_order FROM role2, role3
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON db_0.t_order FROM user_dev
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON SCHEMA public FROM default_role
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON SCHEMA public FROM default_role, role2
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON TABLE t_order FROM default_role, role2
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES FROM user_dev
REVOKE CREATE ON SCHEMA public FROM default_role
REVOKE INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON *.* FROM user_dev
REVOKE INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON t_order FROM user_dev
REVOKE EXECUTE ON ALL FUNCTIONS IN SCHEMA public FROM default_role
REVOKE SELECT ON db_0.t_order FROM user_dev
REVOKE SELECT (order_id) ON db_0.t_order FROM user_dev
REVOKE SELECT ON db_0.t_order FROM user_dev, user2
REVOKE INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON db_0.t_order FROM user_dev
REVOKE role_dev FROM FUNCTION db_0.function1
REVOKE default_role, role2 FROM role3, role4
REVOKE role_dev, role2 FROM FUNCTION db_0.function1, FUNCTION db_0.function2
REVOKE SELECT ON *.* FROM user_dev
REVOKE SELECT (order_id) ON TABLE t_order FROM default_role
REVOKE SELECT ON *.* FROM 'user_dev'@'localhost'
REVOKE SELECT ON ALL SEQUENCES IN SCHEMA public FROM default_role
REVOKE SELECT ON ALL TABLES IN SCHEMA public FROM default_role
REVOKE SELECT (order_id) ON t_order FROM user_dev, user2
REVOKE CREATE SESSION FROM user_dev
REVOKE CREATE SESSION FROM user_dev, user2
REVOKE CREATE ANY MATERIALIZED VIEW, ALTER ANY MATERIALIZED VIEW, DROP ANY MATERIALIZED VIEW FROM user_dev
REVOKE SELECT ON TABLE t_order FROM default_role
REVOKE SELECT ON t_order FROM user_dev
